sessiondvd
Class SessionManager

java.lang.Object
  sessiondvd.SessionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
iSession, pSession, sSession
public class SessionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements iSession

This class acts as a MEDIATOR to manage the ADMIN and STANDARD sessions.

Author:
100413064 (Shivam Kalra), 100400174 (Nishant Bhatt)

createSession

public static iSession createSession()
This is a factory method to create object of THIS. The class is singleton class, therefore, object of THIS could be created only once.

Returns:
the same session that is currently running.
